metadata.Title: CVE-2020-11979 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: As mitigation for CVE-2020-1945 Apache Ant 1.10.8 changed the permissionsof temporary files it created so that only the current user was allowed toaccess them. Unfortunately the fixcrlf task deleted the temporary file andcreated a new one without said protection, effectively nullifying theeffort. This would still allow an attacker to inject modified source filesinto the build process.

criterions.comment: ant: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
